body.name: BestMassage 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress for Cool Sleep & Pressure Relief, Medium Firm Queen Mattress for Kids Adults, Bed-in-a-Box, CertiPUR-US Certified,White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 46 mins
features: Get the best sleep: Our 12-inch mattresses are carefully designed with gel memory foam to keep you cool and comfortable all night long. The surface of the mattress is made of skin-friendly fabric to improve air permeability. The foam layer in the middle consists of 2.5-inch memory gel + 9.5-inch high-density base support sponge. It is essential for your bedroom, providing you with comfort and support to sleep better at night.

Durable and stable: Our mattresses are CertiPUR USA certified for durability, performance and content. Our mattresses provide high-tech memory foam support while reducing excessive movement and fit the body of everyone sharing the mattress. It gives you a healthy, cloud-like experience. The mattress is compatible with most bases and frames and is a good choice for bunk beds, rolling beds, children's rooms, guest rooms and bedrooms.

Professional design: Our technology enables this hybrid mattress to be efficiently compressed into a box for easy transport and transport to the bedroom. Simply open the box and unfold, and the mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape in 72 hours.

Many options: We are very confident in finding the perfect bed for you, we have a variety of options, you can choose the best for you, you can sleep on it for 100 nights. Every purchase is a significant investment for you, including how your body feels, the longevity of the product and the money you spend out of your pocket, and our wide range of options allows you to find the bed that meets all your needs without waiting any longer

Easy to clean and maintain: The mattress includes a soft protective cover that can be washed for your convenience. Stress-relieving gel foam will naturally remove heat from your body, allowing you to sleep more comfortably at night; The four-way stretch design is used all around, with exquisite details, and can be used with memory foam to optimize its consistency. Memory foam infused with gel keeps you cool during sleep, and memory foam that shapes your body reduces pressure points and aligns your spine properly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Description： Product Features: Made of the highest quality CertiPUR US certified foam. Conform to your body and reduce pressure points Gel Memory foam automatically adjusts to your body’s weight and temperature. Our Gel Memory foam are suitable for all frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed. Product Specifications: --Material: Foam Sponge--Color: White--Package Included: 1 x mattress Reminder and Notices: Before use, please put the gel mattress flatly in a ventilated area for 72 hours until fully expanded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more sleepless nights
reviews.reviewText: Amazing I sleep so well now it’s been about a month or so, I waited to actually try it out and 30+ days later it’s still amazing thank god I can finally get a good nights sleep..soft but firm , I don’t wake the hubby if I turn over it’s not hot to sleep on .. but perfectly cradles your body in a oh so perfect way must have in your bedroom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great value for price! Was more dense than expected. The cover is a looser zippered and made of soft materials on top and a thicker canvas type material on bottom. The foam is varying degrees of density with the fluffy layer on top. Came as expected fast delivery. Was expecting days of expansion but It fluffed up in about 5 minutes. Smells clean and new. The most comfortable mattress I’ve had in years. Easy to setup.
